DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator plan recruit 70 patient report high level stress test impact Positive Affect Journaling . Patients randomize use online intervention ask journal one seven topic , several day week , three month . The topic ( e.g. , `` What go well '' ) design help individual focus positive aspect life past day . Each topic base prompt show effective study one week duration . In summer 2012 , research team pilot test prompt 20 patient high level anxiety , lead important change prompt , increase potential impact . The main aim understand impact Positive Affect Journaling psychological distress , measure National Health Interview Survey .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Online Positive Affect Journaling Intervention
